targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (data ->> 'qty') :: float AS kg,
  timestamp AS time
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  name = 'weight_body_mass'
  AND "timestamp" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND "timestamp" <= $__timeTo();

SELECT
  COALESCE(SUM((data ->> 'qty') :: float), 0) AS km,
  generate_series(
    date_trunc('day', min(timestamp)),
    date_trunc('day', max(timestamp)),
    '1 day' :: interval
  ) AS time
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  name = 'walking_running_distance'
  AND "timestamp" > $__timeFrom()
  AND "timestamp" < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
  date_trunc('day', timestamp)
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  COALESCE(SUM((data ->> 'qty') :: float), 0) AS step,
  generate_series(
    date_trunc('day', min(timestamp)),
    date_trunc('day', max(timestamp)),
    '1 day' :: interval
  ) AS time
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  name = 'step_count'
  AND "timestamp" > $__timeFrom()
  AND "timestamp" < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
  date_trunc('day', timestamp)
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
	COALESCE(SUM((data ->> 'deep')::float), 0) AS deep,
	COALESCE(SUM((data ->> 'core')::float), 0) AS core,
	COALESCE(SUM((data ->> 'awake')::float), 0) AS awake,
	COALESCE(SUM((data ->> 'rem')::float), 0) AS rem,
	generate_series(date_trunc('day', min(timestamp)), date_trunc('day', max(timestamp)), '1 day'::interval) AS time
FROM
	metrics
WHERE
	name = 'sleep_analysis'
	AND "timestamp" > $__timeFrom()
  AND "timestamp" < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
	date_trunc('day', timestamp)
ORDER BY
	time;

SELECT

SELECT
  COALESCE(AVG((data ->> 'qty') :: float), 0) AS kg,
  generate_series(
    date_trunc('day', min(timestamp)),
    date_trunc('day', max(timestamp)),
    '1 day' :: interval
  ) AS time
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  name = 'lean_body_mass'
  AND "timestamp" > $__timeFrom()
  AND "timestamp" < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
  date_trunc('day', timestamp)
ORDER BY
  time;
